channel.title: 718 [Ben's Project] Need Help
channel.description:
[COLOR="#800080"]Ive Got This Command, And When I add The 2nd Command, I Get These Errors[/COLOR]
[CODE] if (itemId == 11694) if (!player.getInventory().containsItem(8851, 200000000)){ player.getPackets().sendGameMessage("You Need <col=ff0000>200M Upgrade Tokens</col> To Upgrade Armadyl Godsword!"); player.getPackets().sendGameMessage("Remember To Have precisely <col=ff0000>200M Upgrade Tokens</col> In Your Inventory!"); } if (!player.getInventory().containsItem(11694, 1)){ player.getPackets().sendGameMessage("You Need An Armadyl Godsword In Your Inventory!"); } if (itemId == 11694) { if (player.getInventory().containsItem(8851, 200000000)){ if (player.getInventory().containsItem(11694, 1)){ player.getPackets().sendGameMessage("You've Just Upgraded Your Armadyl Godsword!"); player.getInventory().deleteItem(11694, 1); player.getInventory().deleteItem(8851, 200000000); player.getInventory().addItem(23679, 1); for (Player players : World.getPlayers()){ if (players == null) continue; players.getPackets().sendGameMessage("<img=7><col=ff0000>" + player.getDisplayName() + "</col> Has Just Upgraded His <col=ff0000>Armadyl Godsword</col>!");[/CODE] [CODE] if (itemId == 11696) if (!player.getInventory().containsItem(8851, 200000000)) { player.getPackets().sendGameMessage("You Need <col=ff0000>200M Upgrade Tokens</col> To Upgrade Bandos Godsword!"); player.getPackets().sendGameMessage("Remember To Have precisely <col=ff0000>200M Upgrade Tokens</col> In Your Inventory!"); } if (!player.getInventory().containsItem(11696, 1)) { player.getPackets().sendGameMessage("You Need An Bandos Godsword In Your Inventory!"); } if (itemId == 11696) { if (player.getInventory().containsItem(8851, 200000000)) { if (player.getInventory().containsItem(11696, 1)) { player.getPackets().sendGameMessage("You've Just Upgraded Your Bandos Godsword!"); player.getInventory().deleteItem(11696, 1); player.getInventory().deleteItem(8851, 200000000); player.getInventory().addItem(23680, 1); for (Player players : World.getPlayers()) { if (players == null) continue; players.getPackets().sendGameMessage("<img=7><col=ff0000>" + player.getDisplayName() + "</col> Has Just Upgraded His <col=ff0000>Bandos Godsword</col>!"); return; } } } } }[/CODE]
[COLOR="#800080"]Errors![/COLOR]

item.title: 718 [Ben's Project] Need Help
item.dc:creator: @Ashi Ashi
item.description:
@Ashi wrote:

try this?

if (itemId == 11694) { if (!player.getInventory.containsItem(8851, 200000000)) { player.getPackets("You need <col=ff0000>200m Upgrade Tokens </col>to upgrade Bandos Godsword!"); player.getPackets("Remember To Have precisely <col=ff0000>200M Upgrade Tokens</col> In Your Inventory!"); } if (!player.getInventory().containsItem(11696, 1)) { player.getPackets().sendGameMessage("You Need An Bandos Godsword In Your Inventory!"); } } else { player.getPackets().sendGameMessage("You've Just Upgraded Your Bandos Godsword!"); player.getInventory().deleteItem(11696, 1); player.getInventory().deleteItem(8851, 200000000); player.getInventory().addItem(23680, 1); for (Player players : World.getPlayers()) { if (players == null) continue; players.getPackets().sendGameMessage("<img=7><col=ff0000>" + player.getDisplayName() + "</col> Has Just Upgraded His <col=ff0000>Bandos Godsword</col>!"); } }

Read full topic

item.title: 718 [Ben's Project] Need Help
item.dc:creator: @GodzFather GodzFather
item.description:
@GodzFather wrote:

Nope Doesnt work Can anyone please Help me!!

Read full topic

item.title: 718 [Ben's Project] Need Help
item.dc:creator: @Ashi Ashi
item.description:
@Ashi wrote:

       if (itemId == 11696) {

or remove a } from the bottom

item.description:
@GodzFather wrote:

[COLOR="#800080"]Ive Got This Command, And When I add The 2nd Command, I Get These Errors[/COLOR]

if (itemId == 11694) if (!player.getInventory().containsItem(8851, 200000000)){ player.getPackets().sendGameMessage("You Need <col=ff0000>200M Upgrade Tokens</col> To Upgrade Armadyl Godsword!"); player.getPackets().sendGameMessage("Remember To Have precisely <col=ff0000>200M Upgrade Tokens</col> In Your Inventory!"); } if (!player.getInventory().containsItem(11694, 1)){ player.getPackets().sendGameMessage("You Need An Armadyl Godsword In Your Inventory!"); } if (itemId == 11694) { if (player.getInventory().containsItem(8851, 200000000)){ if (player.getInventory().containsItem(11694, 1)){ player.getPackets().sendGameMessage("You've Just Upgraded Your Armadyl Godsword!"); player.getInventory().deleteItem(11694, 1); player.getInventory().deleteItem(8851, 200000000); player.getInventory().addItem(23679, 1); for (Player players : World.getPlayers()){ if (players == null) continue; players.getPackets().sendGameMessage("<img=7><col=ff0000>" + player.getDisplayName() + "</col> Has Just Upgraded His <col=ff0000>Armadyl Godsword</col>!");

if (itemId == 11696) if (!player.getInventory().containsItem(8851, 200000000)) { player.getPackets().sendGameMessage("You Need <col=ff0000>200M Upgrade Tokens</col> To Upgrade Bandos Godsword!"); player.getPackets().sendGameMessage("Remember To Have precisely <col=ff0000>200M Upgrade Tokens</col> In Your Inventory!"); } if (!player.getInventory().containsItem(11696, 1)) { player.getPackets().sendGameMessage("You Need An Bandos Godsword In Your Inventory!"); } if (itemId == 11696) { if (player.getInventory().containsItem(8851, 200000000)) { if (player.getInventory().containsItem(11696, 1)) { player.getPackets().sendGameMessage("You've Just Upgraded Your Bandos Godsword!"); player.getInventory().deleteItem(11696, 1); player.getInventory().deleteItem(8851, 200000000); player.getInventory().addItem(23680, 1); for (Player players : World.getPlayers()) { if (players == null) continue; players.getPackets().sendGameMessage("<img=7><col=ff0000>" + player.getDisplayName() + "</col> Has Just Upgraded His <col=ff0000>Bandos Godsword</col>!"); return; } } } } }
